timeline.title: 2015-2025 AI Timeline
timeline.description: A chronological overview of events in artificial intelligence across technology, policy, culture, and other fields from 2015 to 2025.
timeline.linkDescription: You can access the original documents through the links in each item.
timeline.disclaimer: All events are selected based on subjective criteria, and some important events may be omitted.
